item.title: FT Most Read: Monday, September 9, 2024 at 5:15 AM UTC
item.description:
1. Oaktree calls out Advent and Silver Lake over collapsed start-up
2. Ukraine’s Kursk offensive has triggered doubts among Russian elite, spy chiefs say
3. Harris faces crucial debate as polls hint at slipping momentum
4. [Opinion] The weird truth about work is we actually like it
5. Iran ships ‘hundreds’ of ballistic missiles to Russia
item.guid: FT Most Read: Monday, September 9, 2024 at 5:15 AM UTC
